I think this game is a must play for anyone into pc games. The gameplay is classic and fun with a compelling story and atmosphere. On sale you can pick this thing up for a couple dollerydoos, do yourself the favor.
Don't shoot! I'm with the science team!

So, there's a lot to unpack here. The game is called Half-Life 2, and 2 * 0.5 = 1, so is this game just "Life"? Then again, on steam the title is stylized to look like the 2 is an exponent, making it (0.5)^2, or 0.25 making it "Quarter-Life", which I unknowingly referenced in my well-thought out and expertly crafted Half-Life 1 review. So this begs the question, and yes, I'm asking YOU, Valve. Is this game Life or Quarter-Life? I'm losing sleep over this conundrum.
A classic that is worth playing!
